name: Engineer
description: Craft and conjure devices to defeat your enemies. Befriend robots and fellow lawful beings.

name: Necromancer
description: Harness the power of the dead and drain life from everything around you.
rules: You may control up to 5 times your level in undead minions. The percent in total undead capacity that you exceed this number is the chance that you will temporarily lose control of your undead minions.
alignment: Must be neutral aligned or below.

name: Rogue
description: Become as quiet as the wind to sneak past your foes and strike when the time is right. Talk your way out of any scenario.

name: Mage
description: Cast powerful and deadly spells to control the world around you.

name: Overlord
description: Control hordes of minions to do your bidding. Lead your army into battle.
rules: You may control up to 10 times your level in minions. The percent in total minion capacity that you exceed this number is the chance that you will temporarily lose control of your minions.

name: Eldritch Knight
description: Become a mage that knows how to fight, dealing both magical and non-magical damage.

name: Bard
description: A musical stranger who may or not scam the local parents with promises of extracurricular activities.

name: Druid
description: Plants and animals are your friends. Gain affinities with animals, monsters, and even dragons, learning their powers.
rules: Instead of mana, druid spells get uses per day starting at 3. For each improvement of the spell, increase the number of uses by 3.

name: Ranger
description: Become a druid that knows how to fight, harnessing the power of nature and your own raw strength.
rules: Instead of mana, druid spells cast by rangers get uses per day starting at 1. For each improvement of the spell, increase the number of uses by 1.

name: Fighter
description: Overpower your enemies with massive amounts of defense and strength.

name: Python Mage
description: Python mages use a REPL and the Python coding language to use multiple spells in one cast. While a Python mage does not have many offensive abilities by themselves, if they have another class, a Python mage can become very powerful. Python mages rely on using their other spells in functions to call upon tremendous power in an instant.

name: Crystallite
description: A young magic from a corner of the multiverse. Create crystals and lasers from quantum energy.
rules: Each crystallite has their own wavelength, giving them a unique color and identification. Ask your DM to see what colors are available. Crystallites use CEJ instead of mana.
